data.title: The Clarks
data.meta_description: Big Rail Brewing is honored to present The Clarks, live in concert, August 3rd, 2024 at 7pm on our stage in
data.text:
Big Rail Brewing is honored to present The Clarks, live in concert, August 3rd, 2024 at 7pm on our stage in the woods! Get ready for an unforgettable evening with one of Pittsburgh’s most widely renowned rock bands, in a beautiful rustic venue tucked away in the western Pennsylvania forest. With special guest opener The Alyssa Hankey Band.

About The Clarks

The four original Clarks members, Scott Blasey (vocals, acoustic guitar), Rob James (6 and 12-string electric guitars, vocals), Greg Joseph (bass, vocals) and David Minarik (drums, vocals) first met while students at Indiana University of Pennsylvania (IUP) in the late ’80s.

With a highlight reel that includes the Late Show with David Letterman, The Simpsons, and others, The Clarks are enjoying their time together as a band now more than ever. “It’s one big extended family,” says guitarist Rob James. “Dave’s son Noah plays on our albums, and with us live, so saying that isn’t just a metaphor, it’s fact!”

Singing and playing new songs from the band’s 2022 EP Tracks and their 2018 full-length Madly In Love At The End Of The World has rekindled a fire in The Clarks’ sometimes broken, sometimes mended hearts.

Visit The Clarks’ Web Site >>

Need Lodging?

Upgrade your concert experience by booking a room at our partner hotels to receive FREE shuttle service! Discount rate, free breakfast, and best of all, shuttle to and from the show for a safe and easy night out!

View lodging options here (clicking takes you to the appropriate partner site):

Big Rail Brewing Concert 8/3 – Hampton Inn & Suites >>

Big Rail Brewing Concert 8/3 – Holiday Inn Express >>

Agenda

4:00pm – Big Rail Tap Room Opens / Early Check-in Begins

Because of the size of this event, **just for today** we’ll be requiring all visiting patrons to have or purchase a ticket to be on-site. Once you’ve checked in and received a wrist band, you can hang out and have a pint in the tap room & back patio area until the beer garden gates open.

5:30 PM – Beer Garden Gates open for ticket holders

If you’ve checked in and received a wrist band you’ll be able to freely enter & exit the beer garden / venue area starting at 5:30pm.

7:00 PM – Let the Show Begin

The Alyssa Hankey Band opens, followed by The Clarks
